Introducing a browser extension that verifies the authenticity of every website through a safety rating based on 8 critical parameters, ensuring a significantly safer web browsing experience.

Once you’ve downloaded Scambush, it gives every website you visit a rating out of 5, with 5 being the highest.

For any website rated below 3, be cautious and avoid sharing any information online.

Download the extension today to ensure a safer web browsing experience tomorrow.
